title: What is ubiquitous computing used for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Uses of ubiquitous computing: Ubiquitous computing is represented by the growing Internet of Things marketUbiquitous computing leads to a deluge of Big DataUbiquitous computing is already present in the cloudCognitive computing & analytics exemplifies ubiquitous computingUbiquitous computing is about new business models and services
I would recommend to read the below link for the same. Ubiquitous Computing - Wisemonkeys
